import { Disclosure } from "@headlessui/react"; import { Bars3Icon, XMarkIcon } from "@heroicons/react/24/outline"; import { PlusIcon } from "@heroicons/react/20/solid"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Navbar() { return ( {({ open }) => ( <>
{/* Mobile menu button */} Open main menu {open ? ( ) : ( )}
Home <> Add Transaction Dashboard <> Login Register <>
New Transaction
{/* Mobile */}
Home Dashboard <> Login Register
)} ); }
